meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I shopped for groceries at the store.
meanings.sent2: She shopped for a new dress for the party.
meanings.sent3: Tom shopped for a magic wand, hoping it would make him fly.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shopped the room, searching for the perfect gift.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her heels echoed as she shopped through the mall.

meanings.definition: To visit shops for purchasing goods or services.
meanings.sent1: We shopped around the city for the best deals on furniture.
meanings.sent2: They shopped at the local market for fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: The penguins shopped for sunglasses to protect their eyes from the snow glare.
meanings.sent4: His mind shopped for memories of the old bookstore he used to visit.
meanings.sent5: The children happily shopped for toys at the toy store.

meanings.definition: To manipulate a photograph using software to alter its appearance.
meanings.sent1: She shopped the image to remove the red-eye effect.
meanings.sent2: He shopped the picture to add a vintage filter.
meanings.sent3: The cat shopped the photo to make it look like it was wearing a hat.
meanings.sent4: The artist shopped the portrait to give it a surreal touch.
meanings.sent5: The designer shopped the photo to enhance the colors and contrast.
